dublin_core.dcvalue: A double blind randomized parallel group placebo controlled trial was conducted in patients with paroxysmal atrial fibrillation or flutter PAF PAFL experiencing 2 or more episodes of symptomatic PAF PAFL during a 28 day observation period to determine the dose response effect and safety of flecainide
Circulation journal : official journal of the Japanese Circulation Society

Dose-response effect of flecainide in patients with symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation and/or flutter monitored with trans-telephonic electrocardiography: a multicenter, placebo-controlled, double-blind...
